== Gameplay ==
+
== Gameplay and Levels==
In each level, certain task must be performed, so the exit gate can be activated, then, if kiki moves through the activated exit gate, it will be 'beamed' to the next level. [http://kiki.sourceforge.net/manual/index.html] <br>
In each level, certain task must be performed, so the exit gate can be activated, then, if kiki moves through the activated exit gate, it will be 'beamed' to the next level. [http://kiki.sourceforge.net/manual/index.html] <br>
Gravity works towards the surface you were last touching and kiki can walk around the walls and on all sides of any block. [http://agameaday.blogspot.com/2005/09/kiki-nanobot.html] <br>
Gravity works towards the surface you were last touching and kiki can walk around the walls and on all sides of any block. [http://agameaday.blogspot.com/2005/09/kiki-nanobot.html] <br>
